john_slick.name: John Slick
john_slick.desc: After reloading quicker fire rate for 5 seconds.

bolt_proficiency.name: Bolt Proficiency
bolt_proficiency.desc: Unlocks the ability to target an enemies vitals. This is done by keeping a target hovered with your cursor for a short time before shooting; causing the shot to ignore some armour on the target.

space_maker.name: Space Maker
space_maker.desc: Adds a concussive effect to enemies hit at close range that slows and disorients them (pauses their actions for a split second). If enemy was hit at close range, also knocks them back slightly.

close_quarters_training.name: Close Quarters Training
close_quarters_training.desc: Minimum effective range of this weapon is reduced by 40%.

reload_artist_scopes.name: Reload Artist: Scopes
reload_artist_scopes.desc: Allows you to remain zoomed-in while reloading this weapon when scoped.

reload_artist_speed_reload.name: Reload Artist: Speed Reload
reload_artist_speed_reload.desc: Double-press the reload button to speed up the reload process of magazine-fed weapons, but any ammunition already in the magazine will be lost.

run_and_gun.name: Run and Gun
run_and_gun.desc: You can now shoot this weapon while sprinting.

marksman_awareness.name: Marksman Awareness
marksman_awareness.desc: When using this weapon while scoped, you will be able to partially see the area beyond the reticle interface, while the cross-hair will also be instantly visible.

fast_focus.name: Fast Focus
fast_focus.desc: Hover over the target with the cursor to make the cross-hair shrink more quickly.

fast_hands.name: Fast Hands
fast_hands.desc: Switching to this type of weapon is 50% faster.

penetrating_shot.name: Penetrating Shot
penetrating_shot.desc: A killing shot will result in the bullet continuing on its path to hit a target behind the first.

empowered_backup.name: Empowered Backup
empowered_backup.desc: For 2.5 seconds after swapping to this weapon, all shots will have 15% increased damage.

first_bullet.name: First Bullet
first_bullet.desc: The first bullet of each magazine deals 30% more damage.

impaler_shot_1.name: Impaler shot
impaler_shot_1.desc: Hitting an enemy will decrease its speed by 30% for 1 second.

impaler_shot_2.name: Impaler shot
impaler_shot_2.desc: Hit an enemy will decrease its speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

prolonged_vision.name: Prolonged Vision
prolonged_vision.desc: When you hit a target they will remain visible for 2 seconds when going out of sight.

killer_reload.name: Killer Reload
killer_reload.desc: Increase reload speed by 20% for 1.5 seconds after killing an enemy.

vital_shooting.name: Vital Shooting
vital_shooting.desc: By hovering over a target with your cursor for a short time before shooting, the shot will ignore some of its armor.

improvised_sniper.name: Improvised Sniper
improvised_sniper.desc: Hovering over the target with the cursor for 1 second will increase the maximum effective range of the weapon for that shot.

shotgun_master.name: Shotgun Master
shotgun_master.desc: If using Slug ammunition the maximum effective range is increased.

phantom_bullets.name: Phantom Bullets
phantom_bullets.desc: When shooting Automatic weapons for at least 0.3 seconds, you can continue shooting for a short time even after the magazine is empty.

crosshair_myopia.name: Crosshair Myopia
crosshair_myopia.desc: Increases the radius of the circle in which the cursor must stay to avoid glancing shots.

emergency_sprint.name: Emergency Sprint
emergency_sprint.desc: After switching to this weapon, your movement speed will increase by 20% for 3 seconds.

armor_no_problem.name: Armor? No Problem
armor_no_problem.desc: All shots have an additional 20% chance to penetrate armor.

suppressive_fire.name: Suppressive Fire
suppressive_fire.desc: Provides a 15% damage boost to weapons while firing continuously for 0.5 seconds.

flank_master.name: Flank Master
flank_master.desc: If you are undetected, or not in the viewing cone of an enemy, you will receive a 15% damage boost.

steady_sniper.name: Steady Sniper
steady_sniper.desc: After hitting an enemy while scoped, the optic cross-hair will have double the Ergonomics statistic for 2 seconds.

reload_artist_double_barrel.name: Reload Artist: Double barrel
reload_artist_double_barrel.desc: Allows double-barreled shotguns to be reloaded in one go by inserting both shells at once.
